creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: black cotton fitted to waist with flared bottom; open front, bottom edges, side openings and cuffs have woven red braid with gold rickrack; waist has red, orange, green and blue embroidery; skirt corners and underarms have embroidered designs and waist gatherings at sides; commercial print lining in waist; pleating at top of sleeves
dimension: 45 1/2 x 47 in. (115.57 x 119.38 cm) (width at bottom front)
title: Woman's Robe
